trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around January 28th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdear readers, i have been researching plasma phenomena in albuquerque since last august 2007 using my celestron 8 inch newtonian reflector video system. i acquired about an hour of data of some bright plasmas that i believed were related to an unusual transient phenomena that i have observed. while recording i noticed bright flashes of short duration so i knew i was looking in the right location. the video you will see is compressed in time with the uneventful fill intervals deleted. this makes an hour of data pass over about 4 minutes. the second half of the video is the same sequence with the individual frames extended in time so that that can be observed. advanced video processing techniques are employed to improve contrast. detailed analysis over the following month allowed me to produce an astounding video showing three plasmas that appear to function as a transit portal (wormholes). these plasmas are stationary over the length of the video. gigantic plasma balls fly past at high speed picking up and dropping off cargo that appear to be cylindrical craft with occasionally other shapes present. these craft appear to move into and appear from the stationary plasmas. this video should be viewed along with the companion video "plasma ufo mothership" aka "space time metro". background observations: telescope is an 8 inch celestron newtonian reflector with a celestial video system directly recorded onto computer hard drive. the line of sight is westward from the sandia mountain foothills to the north valley of albuquerque. the slant range is about 8 miles and the elevation difference is about 1000 feet. the observations are made in an uninhabited dark location with the background being the dark ground. knowing the slant range, telescope field of view, ccd size and framing rate of 30 hz i have made the following calculations: 1) diameter of stationary plasmas: 30 meters 2) diameter of fast moving plasma: 230 meters 3) speed of giant plasmas: approximately 11,000 mph 4) size of typical cargo moving between stationary plasma and transit car giant plasmas: 10 x 40 meters. the pictures attached are frames extracted from the video data. please see the video "plasma ufo wormhole" aka "as time goes by" on my youtube site: http:\\www.youtube.com\portigalf conclusions (personal opinion): 1) the stationary plasmas appear to be transit portals (wormholes) of an elaborate "metro" system. 2) the giant plasmas function as rail cars picking up and dropping off cargo. 3) my observations lead me to make the following statement that is shocking even to me after all these months. the city of albuquerque is occupied by a massive extraterrestrial resident population. 4) they occupy the same spatial dimension as we do however their temporal frame of reference is of such high frequency that we cannot perceive their presence. from their frame of reference our society looks almost stationary moving at the speed of a tortuous in the new mexico desert. 5) this is the ground segment of an elaborate wormhole metro system that is connected to the plasma mothership previously reported and documented on my youtube site "plasma ufo mothership". 6) they are living with us in a temporal dimension that makes them invisible. they choose to let us see them on occasion but they live among us without our knowledge. enjoy
Summary: Plasma's at the Earths surface that appear to be transit portals (wormholes)
